buildup.text: Louis Pasteur showed that microbes caused wine to spoil. Heating killed themâ€”pasteurization was born.

discovery.text: His swan-neck flask experiment disproved spontaneous generation. Germs come from other germs.

twist.text: Pasteur was a chemist, not a doctor. The medical establishment dismissed him as an outsider.

climax.text: He went on to create vaccines for rabies and anthrax, proving germs cause disease beyond doubt.

punchline.text: A chemist taught doctors what makes people sick.
